entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Langley
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:52 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Freezing Rain, -5.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Abbotsford Airport 10:35 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Freezing Rain
Temperature: -5.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa rising
Visibility: 2.0 km
Humidity: 93 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -6.5°C
Wind: E 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday: Periods of freezing rain or ice pellets. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Ice pellets or periods of snow mixed with freezing rain changing to freezing rain this afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 11 this morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain or freezing rain. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain changing to periods of rain this evening. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind east 20 km/h. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Rain at times heavy. High 7.
